Michael J. Bannister

Graduate Student Researcher

I am a fifth year Ph.D. student in the Computer Science department at the University of California, Irvine. I am advised by David Eppstein in the Center for Algorithms and Theory of Computation. My research interests are in the design and analysis of algorithms, particularly geometric and graph algorithms.

  • Office: DBH 4061
  • mbannist@uci.edu
